penance.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something that you must do to show that you are sorry for something you have done wrong, especially in some religions
penance.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We prayed and did penance together.
as a penance for his sins
penance.translation[0].definitions[1].de: something that you have to do but do not enjoy doing
penance.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Working in the garden was a kind of penance.
